attributes.additional_details: In the recent year and half the application fees for Tier 1 General Visa Extension have been increased manifold. There is a recommendation to increase these fees again by 50% for any Tier 1 General Visa Holder in the UK to extend their Leave to Remain in the UK. As in all other categories the fees are being increased by roughly 2-3% we would like to request the government to re-visit this fee hike.
